title: Attempting to reconnect in every game
body:
Hi,
Recently I changed from Dodo's ADSL 2+ connection to Dodo NBN (FTTC) and everytime I play league every 5-10 minutes I will get an "attempting to reconnect" show up on my screen and all champions will stop moving and I will disconnect for like 5 seconds then reconnect shortly after. At the same time I will be in discord and I can still hear my friends speak and they can hear me too.
